Class Plane

extends java.lang.Object
    A plane in 3D space.

    • Method Detail

      • signedDistanceToPlane

        public double signedDistanceToPlane​(Voxel point)
        Determines distance from a point to the plane.

        The distance is positive if the point is on the same side of the plane as the normal vector and negative if it is on the opposite side.

        Parameters:
        point - the point
        Returns:
        the distance from the point to the plane.
